body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/blog_raiz-rewards_travel-deals.png)

[__Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu__](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-tempah-percutian-anda-dan-dapatkan-ganjaran/)

__28-11-2021__

__Travel and Get Rewarded!__

The holiday season is nearing, and with restrictions easing all over the country, we bet most of you have already started planning for your holidays. We are here to ensure that you will get rewarded as you spend!

We’ve compiled a list of platforms and places for you to book from and earn cashback with. Whether you’re buying your flight tickets, booking for your hotels or accommodation, or booking for travel activities, Raiz Rewards surely has something for you!

Just with a simple click on “Book Online Now” through Raiz Rewards, you will be on your way to receive a cash reward invested back into your Raiz Investment Account\*.

*\*Terms and Conditions apply.*

Check out our travel-related brand partners below!

__Malaysia Airlines__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/1.jpg)

Malaysia Airlines is the national carrier of Malaysia and one of Asia’s leading airlines. Find deals and book great value fares to 60+ destinations worldwide with Malaysia Airlines!

Book your flight with Malaysia Airlines through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.4%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Firefly Airlines__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/2.jpg)

Firefly is a Malaysian airline operating flights in Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore and Thailand, which offers a convenient and seamless travels for their short-haul flights.

Book your flight with Firefly Airlines through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.47%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Klook__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/3.jpg)

Klook offers a simple way to discover activities, attractions, and things to do wherever you travel.

Book your activities with Klook through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 3.5%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Expedia__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/4.jpg)

Expedia offers travellers an extensive selection of hotels, activities, and travel services to meet every budget and activities of every kind at competitive rates.

Book your trip with Expedia through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 2.94%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Wonderfly__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/5.jpg)

Discover and book your travel activities and services in South East Asia with Wonderfly!

Book your travel activities with Wonderfly through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.7%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Hotels.com__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/6.jpg)

Hotels.com offers hundreds of thousands of bookable properties in more than 200 countries, ranging from international chains and all-inclusive resorts to local favourites and bed & breakfasts, together with all the information needed to book the perfect stay.

Book your stay with Hotels.com through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.2%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__BusOnlineTicket.com__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/7.jpg)

Are you looking for a bus ticket that is less expensive? BusOnlineTicket.com is your best option! It allows you to compare prices, check schedules, and find tickets. You can also choose your seats and pay using a variety of secure online payment methods, including credit/debit card, internet banking, eWallet, and more.

Book your bus ticket with BusOnlineTicket.com through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.47%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Catch That Bus__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/8.jpg)

Skip the long queues and book your bus ticket online anytime, anywhere with Catch That Bus.

Book your bus ticket with Catch That Bus through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __3.19%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Adventoro__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/9.jpg)

Adventoro provides a diverse range of activities and adventures, including canoeing river rapids, caving, paragliding, and even activities such as learning a new language or taking part in educational programs. For those who seek the thrill of new discoveries and brand new experiences, check out Adventoro!

Book your next adventure with Adventoro through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __5.6%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Skyscanner__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/10.jpg)

Skyscanner is dedicated to making travel as simple as possible. They aspire to help people to find the best options across flights, hotels, and car rentals to book the perfect trip!

Book your next trip with Skyscanner through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __24.5%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

To book your travels with any of these platforms, simply open your Raiz app, click Raiz Rewards, click on the platform you wish to book from, and lastly click on the “Book Online Here” button.

Happy holidays and safe travels!

__Book and get rewarded now!__
